{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking which drug is most likely to belong to the same class as drug X, an experimental medication that reduces the action of testosterone by blocking the androgen receptor. From the documents provided, we see that Finasteride, Flutamide, and Anastrozole are all medications that affect the androgen receptor or testosterone levels. Leuprolide is a gonadotropin-releasing hormone agonist that affects hormone levels differently. Therefore, based on this information, it is most likely that one of these three drugs belongs to the same class as drug X.", "answer_choice": C}
